user.title: Add entity
user.description: Select whether you want to add a new Apple Account or FindMy-enabled device.

acc_2fa_request.title: Two-Factor Authentication
acc_2fa_request.description: Select a method to receive your 2FA code.

dev_static.title: Add a static-key device
dev_static.description: Enter the PRIVATE key of your custom, static-key tag and give it a memorable name.

error.2fa_unavailable: No available 2FA methods found. Please try another account
error.2fa_invalid: Error while validating 2FA code. Please try again

abort.protocol_error: A protocol exception occurred. Please report this error and try again later.
abort.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
